Slow Learning Algorithm

Slow Learning Algorithm

slow_learn(x, ...)

# S3 method for data.frame
slow_learn(x, group, loss = conditional_loss,
  totallossValue, conditionallossValue, method, ...)

# S3 method for grouped_df
slow_learn(x, loss = conditional_loss, totallossValue,
  conditionallossValue, method, ...)

# S3 method for resample
slow_learn(x, loss = conditional_loss, totallossValue,
  conditionallossValue, method, ...)

Arguments

x
data
...
other options
group
grouping variable
loss
loss function
totallossValue
total loss attained with overall reduction
conditionallossValue
loss attained for each dimension reduction
method
method used in slow learn algorithm

Value

list of reduced data, projection matrix, group variable, discrimination function, m matrix and dimension reduction method used.

Examples

slow_learn(iris, group = Species, loss = conditional_loss,
          totallossValue = .1, conditionallossValue = .01, method = SYS)
#> $reducedData
#> Source: local data frame [150 x 2]
#> Groups: Species [3]
#> 
#>          V1 Species
#>       <dbl>  <fctr>
#> 1  2.563807  setosa

#> 7  2.216109  setosa
#> 8  2.537257  setosa
#> 9  2.237980  setosa
#> 10 2.593641  setosa

#>           [,1]      [,2]      [,3]       [,4]

#> 
#> $group
#> Species
#> 
#> $discrimFunc
#> qda
#>

#> [1] 0.07331995
#>

#> [1] "reduced"
